snippet: The Masters champion Adam Scott narrowly beat out Tiger Woods as the male player of the year in voting by the Golf Writers Association of America.
abstract: Masters champion Adam Scott narrowly beats out Tiger Woods as the male player of the year in voting by the Golf Writers Association of America.
lead_paragraph: The Masters champion Adam Scott narrowly beat out Tiger Woods as the male player of the year in voting by the Golf Writers Association of America.

headline.main: Scott Edges Woods for Writers’ Award
headline.print_headline: Scott Edges Woods for Writers’ Award
